meaningMnemonic:
You're <kanji>tired</kanji> from <kanji>labor</kanji>. From this, you're showing <vocabulary>fatigue</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>weariness</vocabulary>.

疲労 is a little formal, so you might encounter it more often in writing than in conversation.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
